sentence.Network_en: The story of King Arthur became part of oral tradition.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚瑟王的故事成为口头传说的一部分。

sentence.Network_en: Arthur himself has been portrayed as a weak cuckold.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚瑟王本人被描绘成一个被人戴绿帽子的软弱之人。

sentence.Network_en: At Merlin's instigation, Arthur founds the Fellowship of the Round Table.
sentence.Network_cn: 在梅林的建议下，亚瑟王创建了圆桌骑士团。

means.word_mean: 1. elected Vice President and became 21st President of the United States when Garfield was assassinated (1830-1886)

2. a legendary king of the Britons (possibly based on a historical figure in the 6th century but the story has been retold too many times to be sure); said to have led the Knights of the Round Table at Camelot
